name: Guild Wars 2: Heart of Thorns
description:
Guild Wars 2: Heart of Thorns is a RPG massively multiplayer game developed by ArenaNet. It was originally released in 2015. It was published by NCsoft. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Guild Wars 2: Heart of Thorns is available on PC and macOS.
Lena Chappelle, Maclaine Diemer and Stan LePard scored the game.
